ygData.subject: Re: Intensify Death
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Group and split. There is a base 10% bonus to experience for any groups. Whether it is 2 or 6 10% is added to the total exp of the kill before the split.
ygData.messageBody:
>

Group and split. There is a base 10% bonus to experience for any groups.
Whether it is 2 or 6 10% is added to the total exp of the kill before the
split. If 2 of you hunt as a team you each get 55% of each kill instead of
50% of overall kills. Adding more members drops this bonus a bit and makes
2 man teams the most beneficial pure experience wise, but larger teams can
kill more faster so it make up for this.

Even a 2 man team should drop risk and downtime greatly.

Bullseye

Don Allejundro De Academie Castille

Mirumoto Oushime-Dragon Clan Go Master

Rictus-VZ


> Also had a general question about experience and which is better to do.
Is
> it better to solo a yellow spawn every other time it comes up (lets say
> alternating with an equal level friend) or group with your friend and
kill
> each one and split the exp?
>
> Grymspine Mael'fesience
> Dark Elf Necromancer
> The Forsaken Ones
> Mithaniel Marr
>
